body_html: My reading of the error message is that self._replica_id was None, so the code executed array_ops.reshape(None, ...) which gives this error. @jmchen-g -- do you have any idea why replica_id would be none in training/sync_replicas_optimizer.py:751 ?
body_text: My reading of the error message is that self._replica_id was None, so the code executed array_ops.reshape(None, ...) which gives this error. @jmchen-g -- do you have any idea why replica_id would be none in training/sync_replicas_optimizer.py:751 ?
body: My reading of the error message is that `self._replica_id` was `None`, so the code executed `array_ops.reshape(None, ...)` which gives this error. @jmchen-g -- do you have any idea why `replica_id` would be none in `training/sync_replicas_optimizer.py:751` ?
